text.0: the raptureshedding somadrops effused in our assembly have.
text.1: flowed forth to glorify our prince.
text.2: then tritas maidens onward urge the tawnycoloured with the stones.
text.3: indu for indra for his drink.
text.4: now like a swan he maketh all the company sing each his hymn.
text.5: he like a steed is bathed in milk.
text.6: o soma viewing heaven and earth thou runncst like a darting deer.
text.7: set in the place of sacrifice.
text.8: the cows have sung with joy to him even as a woman to her love.
text.9: he came as to a settled race.
text.10: bestow illustrious fame on us both on our liberal lords and me.
